Package com.variant.client.servlet

Servlet Adapter for the "bare" Variant Java Client, providing greatly simplified integration for host applications written on top of the Java Servlet API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServletConnection
    Servlet-aware wrapper around bare client's implementation of Connection.
    ServletSession
    Servlet-aware wrapper around bare client's implementation of Session.
    ServletStateRequest
    Servlet-aware wrapper around the underlying implementation of StateRequest.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ServletVariantClient
    Servlet Adapter for the "bare" Variant Java Client, providing greatly simplified integration for host applications written on top of the Java Servlet API.
    ServletVariantError  
    SessionIdTrackerHttpCookie
    Concrete implementation of Variant session ID tracker based on HTTP cookie.
    TargetingTrackerHttpCookie
    Concrete implementation of the Variant targeting tracker based on HTTP cookie.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ServletVariantException
    We want to extend from ClientException to stick with the convention.

Package com.variant.client.servlet Description

Servlet Adapter for the "bare" Variant Java Client, providing greatly simplified integration for host applications written on top of the Java Servlet API.

Servlet adapter wraps the Variant Java client with a higher level API, which re-writes all environment-dependent method signatures in terms of familiar servlet objects HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse. The servlet adapter preserves all of the underlying Java clientâ€™s functionality and comes with out-of-the-box implementations of all environment-dependent classes

Since:
0.5
